channel.title: Keyboard display issue
channel.description:
Good day,
I am trying to change the display of my keyboard on my brand new installation of Whonix 14.
This is the command line I use :
``` root@host:/home/user# dpkg-reconfigure console-data Looking for keymap to install: fr_CH-latin1 root@host:/home/user# ```
Unfortunately, after rebooting the system, the keyboard's display remains the default one.
Would somebody please help me to solve this issue ?
Thank you in advance :slight_smile:
